stories.original_headline: Scientists discover hidden deep-Earth structures shaping the magnetic field
stories.original_summary: Deep inside Earth, two massive hot rock structures have been quietly shaping the planet’s magnetic field for millions of years. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Deep-Earth Formations Guiding the World's Magic Aura
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Order of Alchemists has unearthed ancient, hidden rock structures deep within the world. For ages, these massive formations have quietly guided the planet's protective magical aura. Using old records and powerful scrying, they found these structures influence the molten heart's flow, shaping our world's magic.

stories.original_headline: Two-month-old babies are already making sense of the world
stories.original_summary: At just two months old, babies are already organizing the world in their minds. stories.fantasy_headline: Even Youngest Babes Begin to Unravel the World's Mysteries
stories.fantasy_story: Even at two moons old, the youngest villagers are already making sense of the world. Enchanted scrying revealed distinct thought-patterns as infants gazed at images of beasts and trinkets. Wizards used clever automatons to decode these patterns, offering a rare glimpse into the budding wisdom of the realm's newest inhabitants.

stories.original_headline: Spotify’s Page Match syncs your audiobooks and your physical ones
stories.original_summary: Spotify has launched a new feature called Page Match that lets you quickly sync your spot in a physical or ebook with an audiobook. stories.fantasy_headline: The Bardic Circle Unveils a New Enchantment for Scroll Synchronization
stories.fantasy_story: The Bardic Circle has revealed a clever new enchantment, the Lore Link. This magic allows one to quickly find their place between a leather-bound tome and a speaking scroll. Pointing a scrying crystal at a page lets the enchantment's golem read the text and match it with the bard's recitation.

stories.original_summary: Spotify is going all in on books in 2026 and partnering with Bookshop.org to let you buy physical copies of audiobooks and support local retailers starting in the Spring. stories.fantasy_headline: The Bardic Circle Joins Scribes to Offer More Ancient Tomes
stories.fantasy_story: The Bardic Circle is expanding its offerings and has partnered with the Scribes' Consortium to sell actual leather-bound tomes. This alliance will allow patrons to purchase physical copies of their favorite speaking scrolls and help support local scroll-merchants. This news comes just after the Lore Link enchantment was revealed.
